channel.title: Cool cars you've seen recently
channel.description:
I saw a ferrari california '08 the other day.
[img height=426 width=640]http://www.tuning-links.com/uploads/image/2009/September/Hamann%20California/hamann_ferrari_california_08.jpg[/img]
so what cars have you seen recently?

item.title: Cool cars you've seen recently
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:26, topic:523665”]inb4 Bugatti

[/quote]Saw a chrome one at dubai one time, and saw a chrome SLS AMG too.

item.title: Cool cars you've seen recently
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:14, topic:523665”]I rarely see any nice cars in these parts. Due to our harsh winter climate the roads are falling apart and they are built on clay. My township is too poor to keep up with them breaking every spring. Even the rich folk wouldn’t drive something too valuble here. And the highway is always good but doesn’t get much traffic to begin with so there’s no ferrari spottings there.

I’m more of a pickup truck guy now, but one car that I think is loveing awesome and affordable with a decent job is the Subaru wrx STI. Some of the older models were nice but I think now is the best time to buy one.
(and sorry if polluting thread with a lower standard of whats a cool car)

subaru-impreza-wrx-sti-black-volk-te37sl-3.jpg800×533

I want a black one with gold rims. Not very original but its so mean looking. It has the speed and balls to back up the mean look.[/quote]
I’m a sucker for wrx stis, I’m also a sucker for golf R32s which I’d love to have. I can buy body kits to make my current golf into an R32 replica but it just wouldn’t be the same. Sad face.

Read full topic

item.title: Cool cars you've seen recently
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

[quote=“HcoJustin, post:22, topic:523665”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=642211.msg4324618#msg4324618 date=1372688322]
boss bought three of these babies in a white for the company at the end of the fiscal year. he also conveniently bought himself one “for the company” in a black.

not a cool card? too bad this is Georgia, trucks are cool here.

http://www.ford.com/trucks/f150/trim/limited/
[/quote]
If it aint a raptor it aint cool.

I also see lots of exotic cars in Cali, its not really special anymore[/quote]California Love (8)

item.description:

boss bought three of these babies in a white for the company at the end of the fiscal year. he also conveniently bought himself one “for the company” in a black.

not a cool card? too bad this is Georgia, trucks are cool here.

You haven’t posted an image
[/quote]sorry internet went out on me :s

http://www.ford.com/trucks/f150/trim/limited/[/quote]In Australia, that model is called a ranger (Ford Ranger)

[quote=“casey., post:2, topic:523694”]

RR I seen at the casino one night. I believe this car is $500,000+[/quote]They are really expensive.

[quote=“jme, post:14, topic:523665”]I rarely see any nice cars in these parts. Due to our harsh winter climate the roads are falling apart and they are built on clay. My township is too poor to keep up with them breaking every spring. Even the rich folk wouldn’t drive something too valuble here. And the highway is always good but doesn’t get much traffic to begin with so there’s no ferrari spottings there.

I’m more of a pickup truck guy now, but one car that I think is loveing awesome and affordable with a decent job is the Subaru wrx STI. Some of the older models were nice but I think now is the best time to buy one.
(and sorry if polluting thread with a lower standard of whats a cool car)

subaru-impreza-wrx-sti-black-volk-te37sl-3.jpg800×533

I want a black one with gold rims. Not very original but its so mean looking. It has the speed and balls to back up the mean look.[/quote]Mmm, dat camber.

item.title: Cool cars you've seen recently
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

The bridge jumping for the dukes of hazard was actually shot out where I live at (literally less than a quarter a mile from my house) so I watched the filming of it. There was also the courthouse scene that was done where I live. Never did get to meet the actors personally but it was an amazing experience.

[hr]

[quote=“Travas, post:18, topic:523665”]Saw this today ('68 mustang cobra)

[/quote]now that’s what I’m talking about!

Read full topic

item.title: Cool cars you've seen recently
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

Stopped by through locktite the other night (A local hotspot for dig races) to watch my brother, and this awesome foxbody mustang making 490whp was lining up with him.

[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mMYUZd80YNc&list=FLepNfBiNLjKDD2TjgfmUn3g&index=1[/youtube]

(Mustang on left, 240 on right)

item.title: Cool cars you've seen recently
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

I rarely see any nice cars in these parts. Due to our harsh winter climate the roads are falling apart and they are built on clay. My township is too poor to keep up with them breaking every spring. Even the rich folk wouldn’t drive something too valuble here. And the highway is always good but doesn’t get much traffic to begin with so there’s no ferrari spottings there.

I’m more of a pickup truck guy now, but one car that I think is loveing awesome and affordable with a decent job is the Subaru wrx STI. Some of the older models were nice but I think now is the best time to buy one.
(and sorry if polluting thread with a lower standard of whats a cool car)

subaru-impreza-wrx-sti-black-volk-te37sl-3.jpg800×533

I want a black one with gold rims. Not very original but its so mean looking. It has the speed and balls to back up the mean look.

Read full topic

item.title: Cool cars you've seen recently
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

Over the last 5 year’s on vacation i go to Delaware. Here is a list of car’s Ive seen.

Ferrari 458 Italian Spider 2012 model

Lamborghini Gallardo

2013 Porsche Boxster S

Many more, if u want the whole list, just send me a pm

Read full topic

item.title: Cool cars you've seen recently
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

I went on holidays to Italy recently and during my 9 days there I saw a Lamborghini, 2 separate Ferrari models (not sure which, I’m not a car fanatic) and a Camaro. Italians sure love their cars.
